descript.abstract: All day and peak transit 20th, 50th, and 80th percentile speeds on stop segments estimated on a single day for all CA transit operators that provide GTFS real-time vehicle positions data.
descript.purpose: All day and peak transit speeds by segments for all CA operators that provide GTFS real-time vehicle positions data.

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Length of feature in internal units.

attrdomv.udom: Positive real numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Full name of the transit agency
Order of stops for a particular trip. The values must increase along the trip but do not need to be consecutive.
Identifies a stop, station, or station entrance
The 20th percentile speed (mph) for all trips associated with the shape_id and time_of_day.
The 50th percentile speed (mph) for all trips associated with the shape_id and time_of_day.
The 80th percentile speed (mph) for all trips associated with the shape_id and time_of_day.
The number of trips used to find the 20th, 50th, and 80th percentile speeds within the segment.
The time of day period that provides the 20th, 50th, and 80th percentile speeds. Valid values are all_day and peak.
The base64 encoded url for the feed associated with the agency

metainfo.metstdn: FGDC Content Standard for Digital Geospatial Metadata
